holidays.title: National Grammar Day
holidays.description: “It’s an imperative to speak well, write well, and help others do the same!”

holidays.title: National Sons Day
holidays.description: Boys will be boys and molding our sons into responsible men is a journey in itself.

holidays.title: Anniversary of The Coronation of The Sultan of Terengganu
holidays.description: Let us join Malaysians as they pay tribute to their Sultan on his coronation anniversary.

holidays.title: Benjamin Harrison Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate and remember Benjamin Harrison, the 23rd President of the United States.

holidays.title: Brain Injury Awareness Day
holidays.description: Follow the evolution of our understanding of brain injuries and why collective awareness is important.

holidays.title: Casimir Pulaski Day
holidays.description: To make America great, several soldiers sacrificed their lives. One of them is Casimir Pulaski.

holidays.title: Courageous Follower Day
holidays.description: Learn about the two sides of the leadership coin on Courageous Follower Day.

holidays.title: Fun Facts About Names Day
holidays.description: It’s a fun day to learn about the meaning, history, and importance of your name.

holidays.title: Global Day of the Engineer
holidays.description: Celebrate the outstanding contributions of engineers on Global Day of the Engineer.

holidays.title: Guam Discovery Day
holidays.description: Tune in to celebrate and honor the rich cultural heritage and history of Guam!

holidays.title: Guam History And Chamorro Heritage Day
holidays.description: Here’s everything you need to know about Guam and the Chamorro people. Read on for more.

holidays.title: Holy Experiment Day
holidays.description: Did you know that Holy Experiment Day is about the story of the Founding of Pennsylvania?

holidays.title: HPV Awareness Day
holidays.description: Help prevent the dangers of H.P.V. by spreading useful information about the virus.

holidays.title: Ida Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Ida Day by finding out how uncommon the name Ida is in your area!

holidays.title: International GM Day
holidays.description: There’s no game without a game master, all the more reason to appreciate them.

holidays.title: International Scrapbooking Industry Day
holidays.description: Unearth and dust your scrapbooks in readiness to travel down the lane of memories!

holidays.title: Lavity Stoutt's Birthday
holidays.description: A revered leader of the British Virgin Islands with one of the longest parliamentary careers.

holidays.title: March Forth
holidays.description: Get ready to kickstart your dreams and aspirations this March Forth day!

holidays.title: National Backcountry Ski Day
holidays.description: Put on your skis and join the fun celebrations on National Backcountry Ski Day.

holidays.title: National Dance The Waltz Day
holidays.description: Want to throw some dance moves? Don’t worry, National Dance the Waltz Day is here!

holidays.title: National Marching Band Day
holidays.description: March to the rhythm and celebrate the musicians, composers, and performers of the ‘march’ music genre.

holidays.title: National Pound Cake Day
holidays.description: Today, we celebrate pound cakes, remembering everything the minimalist dessert has to offer.

holidays.title: National Quinton Day
holidays.description: On National Quinton Day, reach out to other Quintons and celebrate how unique your name is.

holidays.title: National Ray Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Ray Day by appreciating all the other Rays in the world.

holidays.title: National Safety Day
holidays.description: National Safety Day is a major event supported by both local and national Indian governments.

holidays.title: National Snack Day
holidays.description: Stock up your cupboards and mark your calendars in honor of National Snack Day.

holidays.title: Old Inauguration Day
holidays.description: Ever wondered why the law that changed the old inauguration date was nicknamed “Lame Duck Amendment”?

holidays.title: Toy Soldier Day
holidays.description: Relive your childhood and have fun with our charming chronicle of Toy Soldier Day!

holidays.title: World Day of Fight against Sexual Exploitation
holidays.description: Take a stand and together let us all say no to all forms of sexual exploitation.

holidays.title: World Obesity Day
holidays.description: Obesity is an epidemic, putting people at a higher risk for more serious diseases.

holidays.title: World Tennis Day
holidays.description: Learn the power of a good serve and watch the court come alive!

holidays.title: Bobbi Kristina Brown’s Birthday
holidays.description: Brown was a beacon of hope for young girls who dealt with self-esteem problems.

holidays.title: Dylan Gilmer’s Birthday
holidays.description: “The Ellen DeGeneres Show” producers saw Dylan Gilmer's video and invited him onto the show.

holidays.title: K Michelle’s Birthday
holidays.description: She used the country album as a platform to improve the chances of black female musicians.

holidays.title: Moniece Slaughter’s Birthday
holidays.description: Moniece Slaughter is a true celebrity — reality T.V. star, songwriter, and actor!
